
Well-Typed Programs Can Go Wrong: A Study of Typing-Related Bugs in JVM Compilers
*********************************************************************************

This is the documentation of the categorization
proposed in the OOPSLA'21 paper titled
"Well-Typed Programs Can Go Wrong: A Study of Typing-Related Bugs in JVM Compilers".


Contents
========

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   symptoms
   bug_causes
   errors
   characteristics
